function find_next_char(str, start, c) result(pos)
    character(*), intent(in) :: str
    integer, intent(in) :: start
    character, intent(in) :: c
    integer :: pos

    pos = 0
    do i = start, len_trim(str) if (str(i:i) == c) then
            pos = i
            exit
        end if
    end do
end function

program atcoder_ABC110_C
    implicit none
    character(len=200000) :: S, T
    character(len=26) :: A = 'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz'
    logical :: res
    integer :: i, j, s_idx, len_s
    character :: s, t
    integer :: pos_in_s, pos_in_t, idx

    ! Read input
    read(*, '(a)') S
    read(*, '(a)') T

    ! Check if lengths are equal
    len_s = len_trim(S)
    if (len_s /= len_trim(T)) then
        res = .false.
    else
        res = .true.
        ! Process each character in the alphabet
        do i = 1, 26
            s = A(i:i)
            ! Find first occurrence of s in S
            s_idx = 0
            do j = 1, len_s
                if (S(j:j) == s) then
                    s_idx = j
                    exit
                end if
            end do

            if (s_idx == 0) cycle

            t = T(s_idx:s_idx)

            idx = 1
            do while (idx <= len_s)
                ! Find next occurrence of s in S starting from idx
                pos_in_s = 0
                do j = idx, len_s
                    if (S(j:j) == s) then
                        pos_in_s = j
                        exit
                    end if
                end do

                if (pos_in_s /= 0) then
                    ! Find next occurrence of t in T starting from idx
                    pos_in_t = 0
                    do j = idx, len_s
                        if (T(j:j) == t) then
                            pos_in_t = j
                            exit
                        end if
                    end do

                    if (pos_in_s /= pos_in_t) then
                        res = .false.
                        exit
                    end if

                    idx = pos_in_s + 1
                else
                    ! Check for any occurrence of t in T from idx
                    pos_in_t = 0
                    do j = idx, len_s
                        if (T(j:j) == t) then
                            pos_in_t = j
                            exit
                        end if
                    end do

                    if (pos_in_t /= 0) then
                        res = .false.
                        exit
                    else
                        exit
                    end if
                end if
            end do

            if (.not. res) exit
        end do
    end if

    if (res) then
        print *, 'Yes'
    else
        print *, 'No'
    end if
end program atcoder_ABC110_C
